decan.flavor: Full or dimmed based on birth time availability

astrology_profile.rising_decan_sign: Flavored by [Rising Degree Decan Ruler] in [Sign]

visual_description.head: Helmet, crown, hood, or headpiece description.
visual_description.torso: Robes, armor plating, ritual markings, or sigil-stitched fabrics.
visual_description.arms: Gauntlets, bracers, tattoos, sleeve overlays, or shoulder design.
visual_description.legs: Pants, boots, lower robes, movement gear, or armored plating.
visual_description.aura: Visual aura presence — glowing threads, pulsing light, energy distortion, etc.
visual_description.ambient_flavor: Environmental effects surrounding the Oracle — starlight, mist, echoes, flame, etc.
visual_description.visual_style_notes: Keywords or tone tags — ‘faded ceremonial,’ ‘translucent cyber-ritual,’ ‘bone-armored celestial,’ etc.
visual_description.color_scheme: Optional primary and accent color notes — e.g., ‘obsidian black with solar gold trim.’

weapons.weapon_1: Primary weapon set — may include dual weapons (e.g., dual daggers, dual chakrams).
weapons.weapon_2: Backup or secondary weapon set — alternate combat style (e.g., staff, shield and blade).

visual_attributes.additional_notes: Optional creation context — narrative event, summoning conditions, ritual name.
